languages.text: "Неумирающий так давно шепчет его имя, что оно каленым прутом выжжено в моем разуме. Но скоро душа еретика отправится на суровый суд Его".

traits.locale_text: "Неумирающий так давно шепчет его имя, что оно каленым прутом выжжено в моем разуме. Но скоро душа еретика отправится на суровый суд Его".

languages.text: "The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий так давно шепчет его имя, что оно каленым прутом выжжено в моем разуме. Но скоро душа еретика отправится на суровый суд Его".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."
"The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."
"The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."

"The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."
"The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."

languages.text: «El Inmortal ha susurrado su nombre durante tanto tiempo que está grabado a fuego en mi mente. Pronto, el alma de ese hereje se someterá a Su severo juicio».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."

languages.text: 「不死の者はその名前をとても長い間囁いておられました。それは灼熱の杖とともに、我の心に焼き付いています。ですが、あの異端者の魂は主の強烈なジャッジメントへと送られることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."

languages.text: “很久以前，不死之神就在我耳边低语着他的名字，就像烧红的铁棍烙入我的脑海一样。不过，用不了多久，那个异端分子的灵魂就会接受祂严厉的审判。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."

languages.text: "Der Todlose hat seinen Namen so lange geflüstert, dass er mit einer rotglühenden Nadel in meinen Verstand gebrannt wurde. Aber bald wird die Seele des Ketzers Seinem gestrengen Urteil anvertraut."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."

languages.text: « L'Immortel murmure son nom depuis si longtemps qu'il est gravé au fer rouge dans mon esprit. Mais bientôt, l'âme de l'hérétique devra faire face à Son jugement. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."
"The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen onun ismini o kadar uzun süre fısıldadı ki o isim, kora dönmüş bir damga misali zihnimi dağladı. Ancak yakında kâfirin ruhu, O'nun merhametsiz hükmüyle yüzleşmek için yola çıkacak."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has whispered his name so long, it has been seared into my mind with a red-hot cane. But soon the heretic's soul will be dispatched for His harsh judgement."
